channel.title: The Options menu crashes the game.
channel.description:
Whenever I try to access the option menu, the game crashes.
And btw, it didn't create any dump in my steam folder.

item.title: The Options menu crashes the game.
item.dc:creator: Nekoid
item.description:
Anyone please ? I can’t go further until i can change the difficulty since I can’t pass the ninjas… (way too difficult too me)

Read full topic
item.source: The Options menu crashes the game.

item.title: The Options menu crashes the game.
item.dc:creator: Nekoid
item.description:
How do you drop the resolution without getting in the options ?

Read full topic
item.source: The Options menu crashes the game.

item.title: The Options menu crashes the game.
item.dc:creator: smidy24
item.description:
hey man, dropping my native windows resolution from 1920x1080 to a lower resolution fixed the issue for me… I dropped it down to 1366x768, but may well work on other resolutions… I was still able to run the game in 1920x1080 though.

Read full topic
